lead_paragraph: The streaming service says it expects to add two million subscribers outside America, less than the 3.5 million analysts had expected.

headline.print_headline: A Forecast for Growth by Netflix Disappoints
headline.main: Netflix’s Forecast for Growth Disappoints Wall St.

snippet: The streaming service says it expects to add two million subscribers outside America, less than the 3.5 million analysts had expected.
abstract: Netflix announces it will add only two million members outside United States in second quarter, less than 3.5 million analysts had forecast, sending shares down more than 10 percent; news overshadows positive first quarter, in which total revenues increased 24 percent to nearly $2 billion from year-ago quarter.
